effect.black_white: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.black_2_white_2: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.black_white: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.black_white: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.
